member.name: DML_CREATE_DEVICE_FLAGS
member.summary: Supplies additional device creation options to . Values can be bitwise OR'd together.

member.name: DML_CREATE_DEVICE_FLAGS.DML_CREATE_DEVICE_FLAG_DEBUG
member.summary: Enables the DirectML debug layers. To use the debug layers, developer mode must be enabled, and the DirectML debug layers must be installed. If the DML_CREATE_DEVICE_FLAG_DEBUG flag is specified and either condition is not met, then returns DXGI_ERROR_SDK_COMPONENT_MISSING.
